ingredient-information.sestavine: Aqua, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Disodium Cocoamphodiacetate, Sodium Chloride, PEG-12 Dimethicone, Polyquaternium-10, Cocodimonium Hydroxypropyl Hydrolyzed Keratin, Hydrolyzed Keratin, Panthenol, Citric Acid, Laureth-2, Sodium Benzoate, PEG-7 Glyceryl Cocoate, Parfum, Propylene Glycol, PEG-55 Propylene Glycol Oleate, Hydrogenated Castor Oil, PEG-14M, Mica, Hexyl Cinnamal, Linalool, Limonene, Sodium Sulfate, CI 77891.
